root.name: Blocktality
root.description: OverviewDescription taken from the game's official website: Blocktality is a top-down shooter in which the main character 'Sphero' is fighting against the cuboids for the freedom of his people. The game play involves fast-paced combat interspersed with interesting physics puzzles. Blocktality was developed by three students, Mike Cook, Joe Flint, and Max Lazaroff from the University of Michigan fo r EECS-494: Computer Game Design Development in Fall of 2006. Useful LinksOfficial Websitehttp://blocktality.sourceforge.net
